title: Entidade Plan
body: Represents a recurrence model to the sku.

spec.description: Represents a recurrence model to the sku.

interval.description: Defines the time unit of the plan

intervalCount.description: Indicates the number of times a interval must happen to create a billing

cyclesLimit.description: Limits the number of times this recurrence happens

trialDays.description: Grace period in days to give before start charging this recurrence

startsAt.description: Date to begin charging this recurrence

endsAt.description: Read-only property with expected ending date

chargeRemainingCyclesOnly.description: If set, total cycles will be evaluated as the remaining cycles
